name: Super Gun Baby Run
description:
Super Gun Baby Run  An RPG Endless Run and Gun by KunoNoOni

LD41 Submission. Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Controls

Left Ctrl/Left Mouse Button/Joystick Button 0 - shoot (hold for auto fire)

Left Alt/Right Mouse Button/Joystick Button 1 - Jump

Hints

Running through the rocks or into the aliens will hurt you.

As you level up so do the aliens and the damage the rocks do

Thanks for playing and don't forget to rate the game!
